Wearable Blood Pressure Monitoring
MetaSearchStandardsDatasetsBenchmarksKey

Welcome to the wearablebp.github.io ! This website accompanies our Systematic Review on Wearable Blood Pressure Monitoring. The goal of this website is not only to highlight individual state-of-the-art techniques, but also to provide a more comprehensive picture of devices, dataset, calibration techniques, and algorithm choices that show promise. Here, you can find:

  • Meta: systematic review methodology and main results from meta-analysis
  • Search: search tool for studies included in systematic review
  • Standards: a statistical comparison between different Blood Pressure device standards and the relationship between them
  • Data: a comprehensive list of and a comparison between Blood Pressure Estimation datasets
  • Benchmarks: implementations of highest performing algorithms on datasets
  • Key: description of performance metrics and extracted data from systematic review

A Systematic Review and Meta-Analysis of Wearable BP papers.
